about_the_game:
This is an action adventure game where players need to manipulate the protagonist to traverse steep canyons, exploring unknown terrain and confronting enemies while continuously improving their operational skills. In the game, players will play a brave adventurer, exploring deep canyons, using weapons and confronting enemies.

Game Introduction

1. Players need to track, shoot, and eliminate enemies in the canyon.

In the game, players can use various firearms to fight against enemies.

3. The exciting game scenes bring you different visual effects, and you can enjoy a lot of fun.

4. Enjoy exclusive excitement and more gameplay through a continuous gaming experience.

5. Players need to quickly search for scattered firearms on the ground to counter upcoming enemies

Operation mode



Mobile wasd



Shoot - Left Mouse Button



Change bullets - R
